Player Command
==============

See: `color <../ingame/color.html>`_ `colours <colours.html>`_ `simplify <simplify.html>`_ 

USAGE mode
     mode plain
     mode vt100
     mode xterm
     mode ansi

Typing "mode" will show if your character is set to receive ansi codes
from the mud(used to display colours).
